Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on images sent by a concerned citizen and shared on social media.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the poor condition of roads shown in the images is representative of the entire state of Uttar Pradesh.
Exist alternative explanation: There are alternative explanations provided, such as the claim that the images are from Bilaspur in Chattisgarh or Bihar, suggesting that the images may not be from Uttar Pradesh.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the images are actually from West Bengal, as confirmed by a reverse image search and reports.
Understate: The claim may understate the extent of the poor condition of roads, as it only shows a few images and does not provide a comprehensive assessment of all roads in Uttar Pradesh.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
